summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3220, for the improvement of the alley in block three (3), David. S. Maynard's Plat of the City of Seattle, said alley extending from Main Street to Jackson Street, and lying between First Avenue South and Railroad Avenue South; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39003 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
